name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【福岡サンパレス】 [ysmbvtf3_bc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei delivers her signature intro and call-and-response with the audience.
MC section welcoming the audience to the Fukuoka stop, the tour's finale.
Announcement of the Budokan live and information about the upcoming 3rd album.
Brief introduction of the band members.
Story about visiting the Shiranui Kensetsu waiting room and playing Rubik's Cube.
Information about the focus camera (Oshi Camera) for streaming viewers.
GREETING to Korean viewers watching via live viewing.
Surveying the audience to see where they traveled from.
Promoting the concert hashtag and a joke about 'posting' vs. 'tweeting'.

subtitles.original: 彗星の如く現れたスターの原石！
subtitles.english: A rough diamond of a star that appeared like a comet!

subtitles.original: バーチャルアイドルの星街すいせいです！
subtitles.english: I'm the virtual idol, Hoshimachi Suisei!

subtitles.original: すいちゃんはー？
subtitles.english: Sui-chan is...?

subtitles.original: 今日も可愛いー！
subtitles.english: Today, too, is cute!

subtitles.original: 溜めてみた。今日は。これで溜めてみた。
subtitles.english: I tried building up the tension. Today. I tried holding it back like this.

subtitles.original: はい！星街すいせい Live Tour 2024 “Spectra of Nova” へようこそー！
subtitles.english: Alright! Welcome to Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 "Spectra of Nova"!

subtitles.original: はい、なんとツアーもつい最後の場所となってしまいました。
subtitles.english: Yes, and so, the tour has finally reached its last location.

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ。えー、埼玉...
subtitles.english: That's right. Yes, we've been to Saitama...

subtitles.original: ...大阪、福岡と来て。
subtitles.english: ...Osaka, and now Fukuoka.

subtitles.original: 福岡、皆さん、今日が最後なんです。
subtitles.english: Everyone in Fukuoka, today is the final day.

subtitles.original: 最後に来れる皆さん、こんにちは！
subtitles.english: To everyone here for the finale, hello!

subtitles.original: ちょっと絶妙か。絶妙なMCか。
subtitles.english: That was a bit... exquisite? An exquisite MC bit.

subtitles.original: はい、えー先日も発表したんですけれども。
subtitles.english: Yes, and as announced the other day,

subtitles.original: ライブツアーは一旦福岡で終わりつつ、
subtitles.english: while the live tour ends here in Fukuoka,

subtitles.original: あの、武道館のライブ。実は控えてて。
subtitles.english: I actually have a Budokan live coming up.

subtitles.original: 武道館なんです。すごいよね。
subtitles.english: It's at the Budokan. Isn't that amazing?

subtitles.original: すごいよね。いや本当にそうなんですよね。
subtitles.english: It is amazing, right? Yeah, it really is.

subtitles.original: すごい。本で、新しいアルバムも出ちゃったりなんかしちゃって。
subtitles.english: Incredible. And also, a new album is coming out soon.

subtitles.original: そう、さっき歌ったね、“Awake” も新しい3rdアルバムに、
subtitles.english: Yes, the song I just sang, "Awake", is also included in the new 3rd album.

subtitles.original: あの、入る曲なんですけれども。いっぱいね、聞いてほしいから買ってほしいなー！
subtitles.english: I want many people to hear it, so please buy it!

subtitles.original: 買った！もう予約してくれてる人いっぱい。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: You bought it? Many of you have already pre-ordered. Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: そして、今回も前回と同じく
subtitles.english: And just like last time,

subtitles.original: バンドメンバーの皆さんを引き連れております。みんな！
subtitles.english: I'm accompanied by the band members. Everyone!

subtitles.original: えー私、あの、さっきまで実は、
subtitles.english: Actually, until just a moment ago,

subtitles.original: あの、しらけんのね、控え室にお邪魔して。
subtitles.english: I was visiting the Shiraken waiting room,

subtitles.original: ギリギリまでルービックキューブやってた。
subtitles.english: and I was playing Rubik's Cube until the very last minute.

subtitles.original: あ、可愛い？そうだよね。可愛いからいいか。
subtitles.english: Oh, it's cute? I thought so. Since it's cute, it's fine.

subtitles.original: それでね、ルービックキューブが下手すぎて、
subtitles.english: But I'm so bad at Rubik's Cube that

subtitles.original: あの、ふーたんにね、“ここは、こうして、こう回して、
subtitles.english: Fuu-tan was like, "Do this, turn it like this,

subtitles.original: そしたらこうだよ” って。んーんーんー。
subtitles.english: and then it'll be like this." I was going "Uhh, uhh, uhh..."

subtitles.original: ってやってたら “やめて！カエル化しちゃう！これから歌うんでしょ？” って言われました。
subtitles.english: and she said, "Stop! You're giving me the ick! You're about to go sing, aren't you?"

subtitles.original: 可愛いからいいか！ということで、
subtitles.english: Since it's cute, it's fine! Anyway,

subtitles.original: そんな可愛いすいちゃんを思う存分見れる推しカメラがあります！
subtitles.english: there's a Focus Camera where you can watch cute Sui-chan to your heart's content!

subtitles.original: そう、この推しカメラは、あの、ここに残念ながら来られなかった配信の皆さんの特権です！
subtitles.english: Yes, this Focus Camera is a privilege for the streaming viewers who unfortunately couldn't be here in person!

subtitles.original: 見てるよー。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: I'm watching you! Thank you.

subtitles.original: コメントも読んじゃおうかな。ここら辺に何か宙に浮いてるコメントがね、うーん。
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll read some comments. There are comments floating in the air around here...

subtitles.original: イエーイ、やったぜ、見えてんでー。
subtitles.english: Yay, we did it! We can see you!

subtitles.original: 釣り席、うわーい、俺らの特権イエーイ、言ってますね。
subtitles.english: "Fishing seats", "Yay, our privilege, yay!" they're saying.

subtitles.original: そしてなんと、えー韓国でのライブビューイングも行っています。
subtitles.english: And surprisingly, we're also doing a live viewing in Korea.

subtitles.original: みんな一緒に、アニョハセヨー！
subtitles.english: Everyone together, "Annyeonghaseyo"!

subtitles.original: いやこれ感動するでしょう、韓国の皆さん。“今俺たちに向けて言ったぞ” つって。
subtitles.english: Man, the Korean fans must be moved. Like, "She just said that to us!"

subtitles.original: 嬉しいですね、色んなね、世界の方が見てくださってると。
subtitles.english: It's so nice to have people from all over the world watching.

subtitles.original: え、ちなみに今日、
subtitles.english: By the way,

subtitles.original: 海外から来ましたってこと、人？
subtitles.english: is there anyone here who came from overseas today?

subtitles.original: すごい、いっぱい居なくない？
subtitles.english: Wow, aren't there a lot of people?

subtitles.original: もう一回、海外から来たって人！
subtitles.english: One more time, who came from overseas?!

subtitles.original: うっわ、すごい、いっぱい居るじゃん。すごいくね？
subtitles.english: Whoa, amazing, there are so many! Isn't that incredible?

subtitles.original: え、あの、福岡から来ましたって人！
subtitles.english: Uh, who here came from Fukuoka?!

subtitles.original: え、福岡県民ですって人！え、多くね？
subtitles.english: Wait, who's a Fukuoka resident? There's a lot?!

subtitles.original: え、こんなに居るの？福岡県民。すごいくね？
subtitles.english: Are there really this many locals? Isn't that amazing?

subtitles.original: 居るよーって言った今誰か。
subtitles.english: Someone just said "We're here!".

subtitles.original: え、っと、じゃあ、最後に
subtitles.english: Uh, well, finally,

subtitles.original: 福岡県民でも海外の人でもない人！
subtitles.english: anyone who's neither from Fukuoka nor overseas!

subtitles.original: あー、居る居る。全然居るわ。じゃあ結構なんかこう、半、半、半くらいなんだね。
subtitles.english: Ah, I see you. Plenty of people. So it's like a third, a third, and a third.

subtitles.original: いや嬉しいですね。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy.

subtitles.original: ということで、えーライブの感想はハッシュタグ #駆け巡る星街 でたくさんポスト...
subtitles.english: Anyway, please share your thoughts on the concert using the hashtag #駆け巡る星街 and post...

subtitles.original: 台本いつまでポストなん？
subtitles.english: How long is the script going to say "post"?

subtitles.original: ツイートだよね！ツイートだよね！
subtitles.english: It's "tweet", right?! It's "tweet"!
